38681385.review:
Análise feita para o Curador ​[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/7182586/]Jogos Brasileiros[/url].

❗ Sobre
Pinkman é um jogo indie de plataforma que testa suas habilidades, reflexos e estratégias. O jogo é extremamente simples mas também bem completo, por mais que as imagens mostrem sua simplicidade, só jogando para você ver a qualidade do jogo. No começo o jogo é bem fácil mas vai aumentando a dificuldade com o tempo, mas fique tranquilo pois as 100 fases do jogo farão o jogo ter uma longevidade boa, além de não ser um jogo frustrante, sem contar que conforme as fases passam e entram coisas novas, as fases por si só explicam como cada funcionalidade funciona, sem a necessidade de grandes tutoriais. O jogo foi lançado em 16 de janeiro, sendo desenvolvido e distribuído pela Green Dinosaur Games, estúdio de jogos baseado em Taubaté - SP.

🎮 Jogabilidade
Pela sua simplicidade, não há muitos botões, apenas direcionais e dois botões de comandos, um para pulo e outro para flutuar como se estivesse com uma jetpack, mas na verdade é pelo "peido", tanto que em alguns momentos do jogo você pega feijões que servem para dar uma carguinha extra. O jogo lembra alguns outros do mesmo estilo, não só no visual, mas também na jogabilidade, sem contar que ele é muito bem otimizado, não notei nenhum bug por cima no meu tempo de jogo.

✏️ Gráficos
O famoso feijão com arroz. De fato o pinkman é um pink man, um homenzinho rosa. Os cenários são em geral pouco complexos, literalmente o básico mas bem feito, mas também nem precisa de muito para esse tipo de jogo. Um efeito legal é que a cada replay você tem os cenários com cores diferentes, sempre com um bom contraste.

🎵 Sons/Efeitos sonoros
Assim como nos gráficos, os áudios também são o feijão com arroz, mas bem relaxantes. Também há os efeitos sonoros em pequenos detalhes, como no personagem andando, nos props se movendo pelo cenário, ao pular, ao morrer, etc. Os pequenos detalhes que geralmente são ignorados em jogos do estilo, foram muito bem lembrados, mas se quiser pode mutar o jogo e ouvir outra coisa de sua preferência.

👍 Pontos positivos
> Nível de dificuldade progressivo
> Muito bem polido
> Excelente preço e custo/benefício

👎 Pontos negativos
> As cores podem ser um ponto negativo para algumas pessoas

✖️ Não possui idioma em português brasileiro
✔️ Possui cartas colecionáveis
✔️ Possui conquistas

🕹️ [b]Nota final: 9/10[/b]

38678007.review:
Absolutely amazing. Amazing gameplay, amazing level design and for less than 1€.
It's a very cool platformer and a cool try n die. It's as challenging as it needs to be and I surprised myself to come back to play the game many times until I had finished it, which usually doesn't happen with try n dies.

I love the aesthetic too. Every object is unique and easily recognisable. It has great affordance, the controls are pretty responsive, the levels are not too long and not too short. Mechanics are diverse and come one by one and start getting mixed more and more, making the difficulty curve really well respected, with the first level that introduces a new mechanic being a bit easier and slower, and the next one start getting harder, culminating in that last level.

Anyway. This is a great game, and you should definitely get it as soon as possible.

37971436.review:
A+
This is such a wonderful game. Not only is the platforming fun, it also provides a fine level of difficulty that makes each stage addictingly fun to play over and over again. The difficulty is fair but still hard enough to make you replay the levels a few times, which is great and adds to the replayability. There are 100 levels of pure intensity, each one different from the other. The stages are always changing colors, which is a little hard on the eyes sometimes, but it looks insanely good and really works well for this game.
The developer definitely put a lot of time, energy, and love into this game and it really shows, especially on the very last level (you'll see when you get there for yourself).
Pinkman is such a great game that I will be recommending this to my friends and replaying any chance I get. If you are debating getting this game, just go ahead and get it. It is worth every cent.

37950368.review: short but fun, works great for speedrun

37917560.review:
Ok I will make this short and sweet - if you cannot tell from the images or video this is a very simplistic platformer. I liked the fact there are no timers, no 3 staring a level, no extra things for you to grab or a do it all in one run without dying achievement. So this was a nice change of pace.

The game introduces new ways for you to die ~10 levels or so for 100 total levels. Most levels you can complete in one or two tries; some may take more but none made me rage quit *cough* supermeatboy *cough*. Took me about 2 hours to complete. At $0.99 this game is a steal. Good job Green Dinosaur Games

37419555.review:
PinkMan - one of my favorite platform games. The minimalist aesthetic could discourage some, but I respect this choice. However, sometimes colors hurt eyes... A ethereal background music, some cruel and clever puzzles, stressful situations which need skill - so! briefly I don't like this game - I LOVE IT ++

PinkMan est l'un de mes jeux de plate-forme préférés. Certes, l'esthétique minimaliste pourrait déplaire à quelques-uns, mais il faut respecter le choix du développeur. Néanmoins, certaines couleurs parfois piquent un peu les yeux... Une musique de fond éthérées, des puzzles balaises et intelligents, quelques situations stressantes lesquelles demandent une certaine maîtrise - bref! je n'aime pas - J'ADORE ++

Говоря проще, эта видеоигра - одна из моих самых любимых видеоигр, даже если эстетический вид не всегда приятен для глаз. Тем не менее, нам придётся уважать мнение разработчика. Есть приятная музыка, множество трудных задач, требующих упражнение (попробуй и попробуй ещё, и в конце концов это возможно!). Мне очень нравится. На самом деле я люблю розовый-человек :) Слава ему ++

36151094.review:
Excellent soundtrack, challenging yet strangely relaxing platforming, and a wide variety of obstacles and mechanics. Zero fluff or padding. The constantly changing color palettes keep the minimalist visuals feeling fresh throughout the experience.

Game costs $1 and it took me exactly 66 minutes to complete, so it meets my frugal "a dollar an hour" criteria. In other words: Pinkman is an excellent value and most definitely worth the purchase! 

I'm glad I gave this game a chance considering how hidden it was on Steam.

Honestly one of my favorite games I've ever played.

33296302.review:
Pinkman é um jogo simplista de plataforma hardcore não-tão-hardcore-assim onde você guia um cara rosa que peida rosa por 100 fases que aumentam gradativamente de dificuldade, enquanto novos objetos são inseridos na mecânica.
O jogo não é pretencioso, ele vai lá e cumpre muito bem o que promete: uma mecânica muito bem trabalhada e que não te frustra, fases com uma dificuldade progressiva que não vão te prender por inúmeras tentativas, hitboxes e colisões precisas, diversos esquemas de cor, uma trilha sonora muito agradável (que infelizmente não está disponível para download) e uma duração adequada - o suficiente para não enjoar e até possivelmente te motivar um replay.
O jogo inclui achievements facilmente conquistáveis (para os complecionistas de plantão) e cartas (para os caçadores de insígnias). Para motivar o jogo é vendido a um preço extremamente modesto e muito justo.

32890439.review:
I really like the design of the game. [spoiler] The changing of the colours after every death is a great idea. Due to this the levels are always looking interesting.	[/spoiler] The controlls are responsive and the ability to view the whole level prevents fail and error-gameplay up to a certain degree. Visiuals, music, and the minimalistic appeal are fitting.
When the Level desing is at its best it creates a very nice flow. But some Level demand precise controlls, which are somtimes difficult with a gamepad. Also a few levels requiere you to wait for objects which interrupts the flow and is getting rapidly annoying after a few tries. Even though i respect the simple and minimalistic menu design, it would be nice if you could [spoiler] turn off the wilhelm-scream and [/spoiler] adjust the volume of the death sound. I suggest a visible configuration-file in the game folder.
A nice, interesting and well crafted indie game.
I really enjoyed it.
Definitly worth the 99 Cents. so give it a try :)

31831683.review:
Pinkman es uno de los mejores juegos plataformeros de este año, tiene unos hermosos mapas, soundtracks (que algunos son Vaporwave) y los colores cambian con cada vez que mueres! ES HERMOSO!

Pinkman es una obra de arte de la cual muchos desarrolladores deberían aprender.

[b][h1]PROS:[/h1][/b]
-Mecánicas Originales y divertidas (además de bien desarrolladas)
-Soundtrack hermoso
-El Arte es hermoso, cada vez que mueres los colores de los escenarios cambian y lo hace de una manera taaan buena <3
-La Dificultad es elevada, pero no es suuper difícil, de hecho te dan ganas de avanzar y en ningun momento se hace frustrante!
-Jugabilidad preciosa, sus controles son.. uff men me clavo alta paja con los controles <3
-Solo $0,99!

[b][h1]CONS:[/h1][/b]
-Es corto :(

[u][b]¿Lo recomiendo?[/b][/u] ¡Si! Completamente!
[u][b]¿Vale $0,99?[/b][/u] ¡OBVIO! de hecho, debería valer $2,99 o algo por el estilo!

Nota final: 9/10.

[h1][i]"There's no place like home."[/i]
-Mensaje que aparece en el menu.[/h1]

Pinkman,

>Acho Pinkman, que me remete pra caralho o "N+"
>É barato resolvo comprar
>Galera se reune, e com ela vem quantidades abundantes de alcool
>"Seguinte pessoal, comprei esse jogo aqui na steam, ele tem 100 fases, vamo jogar, quem morrer passa e tem que virar uma shot de vodka"
>Geral gostou da idéia e o jogo começou
>A medida que nós passávamos de fase, o jogo ficava mais dificil
>E nós ficávamos mais embriagados
>Resultado
>Pouco mais de uma hora de jogo
>Quatro garrafas de Natasha esvaziadas
>Dois amigos meus dormiram no chão da sala mesmo
>Tem um vomitando no banheiro já tem dez minutos
>E tem mais um que ainda tá bebendo, sentado na sacada, todo molhado porque tá chovendo
>Por algum motivo desconhecido, tem cocô na bacia onde tinha salgadinho
>10/10 faria tudo de novo
COMPREM ESSE JOGO, CHAMEM OS AMIGOS E JUNTEM MUITO GORÓ, VAI SER A DESGRAÇA MAIS DIVERTIDA QUE VOCÊS VÃO FAZER EM SUAS VIDAS!!!

31168089.review:
Fun, simplistic platformer. About an hour and a half of gameplay. My biggest complaint is that you can't change the controls, (arrows to move, 'Z' and 'X' for actions) but fortunately there is controller support which makes it much more comfortable. No reason not to pick this up if you're a fan of platformers. As a hint 'C' (or 'X' if using an XBOX controller) let's you look at the whole level at once.

P.S. Not sure if the dev will see this, but there is a typo on the final screen.

I was asked to play this game on my youtube channel by the developer when it first released. The controls were pretty easy to handle. The first few levels are pretty easy but it gets more challanging with every level you pass. What made the game a great experience for me was the music. Being able to play this good platformer with amazing music giving you a very relaxed feeling was great to me. I'd defenitly recomend this!

Here is the first part of my Let's Play:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l0DRqwbIzaA

At the end of the video I ran into a bug. I reached out to the developer and he fixed it in an hour. He tries his best to show this game's full potential.

Man, I don't know what it is about this game, but it is so addicting. I'm sitting here trying to stop recording, but I just couldn't end it. Although I'm only on level 29, just knowing that there's more levels (who knows what they'll offer) to this game makes me appreciate it more. 29425679.review:
Maravilha! Puzzles excelentes, jogabilidade confortável e level design muito bem feito! 
Alguns puzzles são dificílimos, mas é só jogar algumas vezes até pegar a manha... lembra bem os puzzles de games da era SNES. Achei que estão sendo muito modestos no preço de venda do game, pela qualidade do do produto, eu mesmo desembolsaria um pouco mais se fosse necessário, porque eu imagino o quanto deve ter sido difícil pros devs finalizar o game. Uma única coisa que aconteceu aqui de errado foi um bugzinho no som, que não iniciou automaticamente, e quando iniciou, eu já estava no level 20 e poucos... daí saí e entrei no game pra testar, e continuou mudo, e lá na frente o som voltou... mas isso é detalhe, porque eu entrei no game no silêncio mesmo e já achei bacana. Parabéns aos devs!

I just started playing this game and it is pretty cool. The soundtrack is awesome with a very 80's vibe. The gameplay is awesome. If you have played Celeste by Matt Thorson before, you will do just fine at the beginning. 

It's an action plataformer where you have to open doors, turn knobs and so on in order to progress. It is pretty simple but the game has a nice progression on the level design getting it harder each time with new doors to open or things that might kill you, as well as complicated designs that are hard to navigate into.

BTW, fun fact! Watching the video on the store page, when the character does the "second jump" I thought to myself: huh, that looks like a fart. Little did I know that the game developer refeers to it as a fart inside the game. That was nice :)

Great job, great game. Having lots of fun with it!

29333146.review:
粉色的小人在彩色的世界里狂奔，电音BGM的节奏感使得自己操控小人跳跃奔跑会随着音乐更具动感。
游戏简洁而富有挑战性。

29332121.review:
2D action platformer with 100 levels. The quality of level design is excellent and imaginative, along with tight, responsive controls. New mechanics are introduced regularly and it feels fresh and challenging throughout. It's difficult but you always feel you can succeed with a few more attempts. Each time you die the level changes its colour theme, this doesn't have any significance to the gameplay but it is a nice aesthetic touch. Pinkman is always pink, of course!

There is no settings menu but everything is already set up exactly as you would want it. Steam/Xbox controllers 'just work', the sound volume is set just right and it starts in fullscreen. Alt-Enter to switch to windowed and you can stretch it to any size you like. Controller X button to zoom the level view in/out, Y to toggle music (which is very good). The whole playing experience feels comfortable and satisfying. Other devs could learn a thing or two from this.

Overall I highly recommend Pinkman, and at this price it's just plain rude not to buy it. I do wish I could play it on Linux though.

29328177.review: I Have Waited For This Game For A Little While And I Am Pleased To Say That This Game Was Worth The Wait! Pinkman Is An Execellent Platformer Where You, Pinkguy Go Through Small But Challenging Courses And As You Get Further And Further The Game Gets More Creative And The Levels Get Harder. I Haven't Noticed Any Bugs So Far Except The Portal Hitboxes (In My Opinon) And The Game Freezes Randomly For No Reason. The Game Has Froze 3 Times Now And Its Definitetly Not My Computer Cause I Just Built Recently But The Game Freezing Is Not Too Bad At All Since You Dont Lose Your Progress. Another Sort Of Annoying Thing Is That When You Die And The Level Changes Colors It Can Be Hard To See Pinkguy Sometimes. But These Small Things Dont Ruin The Game At All So I Think You Should Buy It Cause The Price Is Very Reasonable. ( I May Update This Review In The Future If There Are Gonna Be More Updates To Pinkman Or If I Find Another Bug Or Something.)

29312321.review:
第一次在steam（认真地）写评测，发现我还是第一个简中评测！蛤蛤蛤
-----------严肃的分割线----------
这款2维游戏风格十分吸引人，碰到类似齿轮（？？？）的东西就会gg，此外还有其他一些可利用的因素和陷阱，用左右两个键来移动，z跳跃，x可以向上飞。每次gg后关卡的颜色就会改变（十分感人），音乐也与游戏很搭配。前期十分简单，后期也不虐手，（虽然有几关让我想删游戏）。推荐打折的时候入来玩玩，不过游戏本身也不贵。总共100个关卡，地图很有创意，相信后续还会更新。目前没有中文，但是丝毫不影响游戏体验。
-----------
什么？你告诉我还能挂卡！excited！

29308638.review:
I personally purchased this game. I reviewed it for my 99 Cent Gaming series.

Wow...I think there has been a gold standard set when it comes to games I've reviewed on my show. Ladies and gentlemen I present to you Pinkman, a very fun masochistic platformer that is in the same vein of Super Meat Boy, N+, and those before it.

There is so much going for this title that being priced at a cool .99 (and cheaper if you get it during the first week) makes it almost criminal to not recommend. Everything from the controls to the gradual increase in difficulty to the introductions of new mechanics and obsticals are all done in a way to only help the player understand what exactly brought them their doom.

Like many platformers of this kind, Pinkman offers very simple controls that support both keyboard and controller. I used controller in this case and the character handled very well and never felt too sensitive or weighty. In addition to moving and jumping you can utilize a jetpack (or "fart" if you perfer) to give an extra boost when trying to make up to other platforms or trying to avoid an explosive death. 

Never once did I feel like a death was cheap or unavoidable, something that could have easily been done to make players try over and over again to pad out play time. Every level I had played through for my review (1-35) felt fair, difficult, and fun which only made me want to keep playing once the video was over.

Altough the graphics are very simplistic, they also help the player to keep focused on the obstacles at hand. There's never a distraction thrown at you from how it's designed. The sound is also amazing and it kept my adrenaline going even when I suffered a round of deaths on a few levels.

If I had to nitpick, I wish there were options for recording how fast you beat a level. Games like this are a speed runners dream, and the lack of a time keeping mechanic just baffles me. Hopefully in a future update this can get added.

I have more to save in the video below, but overall this was a joy to not only discover but to review. Controls were on point, everything seemed polished, and it felt like a game with a purpose. Was this worth the .99 cents: absolutely! In fact, I was in doubt I'd ever find a gold standard when it came to games around this price point. Now I hope that I'll find other games that can reach this level of 99 cent enjoyment. Definitely give this developer your support.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=himmyLacgcw
